SEARCH
Package farm.sales.transaction

Class SpecialSaleTransaction

Object
Transaction
CategorisedTransaction
SpecialSaleTransaction
public class SpecialSaleTransaction extends CategorisedTransaction
A transaction that keeps track of what was purchased and by whom.

A transaction has an associated customer and thus their cart to keep track of active purchases.

A transaction exists in either one of two states. Finalised where it is no longer open for modification and instead represents a past sale that has been completed and receipt generated. Or active, where products can be actively added to the customer cart and the receipt is not yet ready.

An extension on the categorised transaction, allowing store-wide discounts to be applied to products.

Component of Stage 1.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Description copied from class: Transaction
      Returns a string representation of this transaction. The representation contain information about the customer, the transactions status, and the associated products.
      It is in the form Transaction {Customer: <customer>, Status: <status>, Associated Products: <products>*}

      Example output/s: 

      "Transaction {Customer: James Smith | Phone Number: 12345678 | Address: 1st Street, Status: Ongoing, Associated Products: [egg: 50c *REGULAR*]}"
      "Transaction {Customer: Lauren Jame | Phone Number: 80145689 | Address: 2nd Street, Status: Finalised, Associated Products: []}"

      The status of the transaction is either Ongoing or Finalised.

      Overrides:
      toString in class Transaction
      Returns:
      The formatted string representation of the product.
